#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<stack>
//Predefined's
#define pb push_back
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sll(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define sull(a) scanf("%llu",&a)
#define p(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define pll(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long
using namespace std;
/*inline int getn()
{
register int n=0,
    c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}*/

int main()
{
//    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;
    s(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n, ans = 1;
        s(n);
        int pos[n],a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            s(a[i]);

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            pos[i] = 1;

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
                if(a[j]<=a[i] && pos[i]<pos[j]+1)
                {
                    pos[i] = pos[j]+1; 
                    ans = max(pos[i], ans);
                }
        }
        p(ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
